PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-23511998-12-210,  ,  ,  ,  LAB
PrecisAppointment of LaRAINE CAROL SINGLER, of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and order that LaRAINE CAROL SINGLER be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective March 1, 1999.
Attachments
